alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Lewis County through 500 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Carthage to 6 miles north of Forestport. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bremen, Watson, Lyonsdale, Greig, Port Leyden, Harrisville, Croghan, Lyons Falls, Castorland, Belfort, Soft Maple Reservoir, Kirschnerville, Diana Center, Beaver Falls, Indian River, Brantingham and Sperryville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
